description:
go/ast: predeclared objects have the Universe/Unsafe scope as Decl

Makes it possible to easily detect if an Object was predeclared
(as opposed to unresolved).

messages.text:

https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

go/ast: predeclared objects have the Universe/Unsafe scope as Decl

Makes it possible to easily detect if an Object was predeclared
(as opposed to unresolved).
